title: Add version command to bin/solr start script
description:
It would be nice to be able to tell which version of Solr you have. You can get it with the status command today, but only if Solr is already running. Proposal:

$ bin/solr -version
5.3.0

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content: Manually tested both on OSX and Windows 8.1. Committing tomorrow.
